text: Charles Leiserson told the story that they had a sign when dev'Ing Cilk about "Only Monsters steal children!" Because that was the approach by a competint parallel scheduler team across the hall.

elements.text: Charles Leiserson told the story that they had a sign when dev'Ing Cilk about "Only Monsters steal children!" Because that was the approach by a competint parallel scheduler team across the hall.

text: Out of curiosity, what was the other parallel scheduler/runtime?
